query.statement: SELECT A.TITLE, --구분 DECODE(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.TITLE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'dy','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=KOREAN'), '월', '月', '화', '火', '수', '水', '목', '木', '금', '金', '토', '土', '일', '日') TRX_DAY, NVL(DECODE(R_AMT, 0, 0,(DECODE(R_AMT_COST, 0, 0, ROUND((R_AMT_COST/R_AMT) * 100, 1)))),0) R_AMT_RATIO, --식음원가율 NVL(R_AMT,0) R_AMT, --식음매출 NVL(R_AMT_COST,0) R_AMT_COST --식음원가 FROM ( SELECT DECODE(ROWNUM, 1, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 7, 'YYYYMMDD'), 2, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 6, 'YYYYMMDD'), 3, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 5, 'YYYYMMDD'), 4, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 4, 'YYYYMMDD'), 5, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 3, 'YYYYMMDD'), 6, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 2, 'YYYYMMDD'), 7, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD')) TITLE FROM DICT WHERE (ROWNUM < 8) ) A, ( SELECT V.TRX_DATE, ROUND(NVL(SUM(V.P_AMT), 0)/ 1000) P_AMT, ROUND(NVL(SUM(V.F_AMT), 0)/ 1000) F_AMT, ROUND(NVL(SUM(V.R_AMT), 0)/ 1000) R_AMT, ROUND(NVL(SUM(V.P_AMT_COST), 0)/ 1000) P_AMT_COST, ROUND(NVL(SUM(V.F_AMT_COST), 0)/ 1000) F_AMT_COST, ROUND(NVL(SUM(V.R_AMT_COST), 0)/ 1000) R_AMT_COST FROM ( SELECT V.UPJANG, V.TRX_DATE, 0 P_AMT, 0 F_AMT, V.AMT R_AMT, 0 P_AMT_COST, 0 F_AMT_COST, 0 R_AMT_COST FROM MAS_DD_ACCTCD_SALE V, MAS_BOND_CODE A WHERE (V.TRX_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD')) AND (A.BOND_GUBUN = 'MACHUL') AND (V.ACCTCD = A.ACCTCD) AND (A.ACCT_NAME = '식음료매출액') AND (V.UPJANG IN (SELECT UPJANG FROM SCO_UPJANG_MST_V WHERE TM_CD = #TM_CD#)) --팀장사번 UNION ALL SELECT V.UPJANG, V.TRX_DATE, 0 P_AMT, 0 F_AMT, 0 R_AMT, 0 P_AMT_COST, 0 F_AMT_COST, V.UNIT_AMT R_AMT_COST --영양사화면 : MARGIN_AMT(출하가), 그외 : UNIT_AMT(매입가) FROM MAS_DD_ACCTCD_COST V, MAS_BOND_CODE A WHERE (V.TRX_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 7, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD')) AND (A.BOND_GUBUN = 'COST') AND (V.ACCTCD = A.ACCTCD) AND (A.ACCT_NAME = '식음료원가') AND (V.UPJANG IN (SELECT UPJANG FROM SCO_UPJANG_MST_V WHERE TM_CD = #TM_CD#)) --팀장사번 ) V GROUP BY V.TRX_DATE ) V WHERE A.TITLE = V.TRX_DATE(+) ORDER BY A.TITLE
